subNodes.conversationText: root
What do we have here?  I didn't think you would make it this far.
Continue
Oh well, your journey ends here.
Continue
Guess again, insane wizard...you shall pay for the murder of my friends.
Continue
You shall join them soon enough.
May we ask a few questions before you dispatch of us?
Why not, ask away.
Why did you attack my brother's camp in the Dark Woods?
They were too close to discovering our operation.
What exactly is this operation?
We are a sort of reconnaissance unit.
Continue
It is our responsibility to learn of the weaknesses of Langdale, Lorenwaite, and other near by settlements.
To what purpose?
In preparation for the forthcoming legions of our Lord.
Lord?
Why yes, the Lord Zorn himself.
But that is impossible.  Zorn was banished by Elos forever.
I heard those same tales, yet he has returned.
I don't believe you.
It matters not what you believe.
May I ask another question?
Why not, ask away.
This is getting boring, let's end this.
Chat time is over, prepare to suffer a quick yet painful death.
End Dialog
I have no more questions.
As you wish.  Prepare to suffer a quick yet painful death.
What is it that you are doing here?
We are a sort of reconnaissance unit.
Continue
It is our responsibility to learn of the weaknesses of Langdale, Lorenwaite, and other near by settlements.
To what purpose?
In preparation for the forthcoming legions of our Lord.
Lord?
Why yes, the Lord Zorn himself.
But that is impossible.  Zorn was banished forever by Elos.
I heard those same tales, yet he has returned.
I don't believe you.
It matters not what you believe.
May I ask another question?
Why not, ask away.
This is getting boring, let's end this.
Chat time is over, prepare to suffer a quick yet painful death.
End Dialog
I have no more questions.
As you wish.  Prepare to suffer a quick yet painful death.
On second thought, let's just end this.
As you wish.  Prepare to suffer a quick yet painful death.
End Dialog
Guess again wizard, it is time for you to meet my sword of havoc...you shall pay for the murder of my friends.
Continue
You shall join them soon enough.
Easy Fledge, stick with the bow...and you wizard, may we ask you a few questions before you dispatch of us?
Why not, ask away.
Shall we begin?
May we ask a few questions before you dispatch of us?
Why not, ask away.
